metadata.title: CVE-2024-27434 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:iwlwifi: mvm: don't set the MFP flag for the GTK The firmware doesn't needthe MFP flag for the GTK, it can even make the firmware crash. in case theAP is configured with: group cipher TKIP and MFPC. We would send the GTKwith cipher = TKIP and MFP which is of course not possible.
